They appear automatically in-game and are announced in global chat. ğŸ¯ AVAILABLE ON ALL MAPS (Center, Ragna, Astraeos) These creatures can be encountered and tamed everywhere: Angler, Ankylo, Argentavis, Arthropluera, Basilosaurus, Carcharodontosaurus Direbear, Giganotosaurus, Mammoth, Megalodon, Megatherium, Mosasaurus Paraceratherium, Procoptodon, Pteranodon, Quetzalcoatlus, Rex, Spino, Stego Tapejara, TerrorBird, Therizinosaurus, Thylacoleo, Beelzebufo (Toad) Triceratops, Carbonemys (Turtle), Tusoteuthis, Woolly Rhino, Yutyrannus ğŸŸ¥ EXCLUSIVE TO RAGNAROK These creatures are only found on Ragnarok: â€¢ Karkinos (Giant Crab) â€¢ Fasolasuchus â€¢ Pyromaniac â€¢ Griffin â€¢ Mantis ğŸŸ© EXCLUSIVE TO ASTRAEOS These special creatures come from DLC or alternative maps: â€¢ Bionic Rex â€¢ Bionic Stego â€¢ Gacha â€¢ Gasbags â€¢ Snow Owl ğŸ§¬ HOW RARE CREATURES WORK â€¢ Unique appearance: aura, glowing rings, increased size â€¢ Spawns every 15 minutes if a player is logged in on the map â€¢ Maximum: 15 active rare creatures per map ğŸ› ï¸ Settings may change over time to adapt to server balance. ğŸ LOOT CRATE SYSTEM â€“ NRV SERVER Our ARK maps (The Island, Ragnarok, Astraeos) use a loot system structured by crate color to help you target your expeditions, collect useful resources, or try your luck at high-level gear. âšª White Crates â€“ General Resources Contain the basics: stone, wood, fiber, meat, and primitive materials.
